panels.description: Number of tokens processed per second
panels.title: vLLM: Token Throughput

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(le, model_name, WorkerId) (rate(ray_vllm:time_per_output_token_seconds_bucket{model_name=~"$vllm_model_name", WorkerId=~"$workerid", }[$interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, model_name, WorkerId) (rate(ray_vllm:time_per_output_token_seconds_bucket{model_name=~"$vllm_model_name", WorkerId=~"$workerid", }[$interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.9, sum by(le, model_name, WorkerId) (rate(ray_vllm:time_per_output_token_seconds_bucket{model_name=~"$vllm_model_name", WorkerId=~"$workerid", }[$interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by(le, model_name, WorkerId) (rate(ray_vllm:time_per_output_token_seconds_bucket{model_name=~"$vllm_model_name", WorkerId=~"$workerid", }[$interval])))

(sum by(model_name, WorkerId) (rate(ray_vllm:time_per_output_token_seconds_sum{model_name=~"$vllm_model_name", WorkerId=~"$workerid", }[$interval]))
/
sum by(model_name, WorkerId) (rate(ray_vllm:time_per_output_token_seconds_count{model_name=~"$vllm_model_name", WorkerId=~"$workerid", }[$interval])))

panels.title: vLLM: Time Per Output Token Latency

panels.description: Percentage of used cache blocks by vLLM.
panels.title: vLLM: Cache Utilization

panels.description: P50, P90, P95, and P99 TTFT latency.

targets.expr:
(sum by(model_name, WorkerId) (rate(ray_vllm:time_to_first_token_seconds_sum{model_name=~"$vllm_model_name", WorkerId=~"$workerid", }[$interval]))
/
sum by(model_name, WorkerId) (rate(ray_vllm:time_to_first_token_seconds_count{model_name=~"$vllm_model_name", WorkerId=~"$workerid", }[$interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, model_name, WorkerId) (rate(ray_vllm:time_to_first_token_seconds_bucket{model_name=~"$vllm_model_name", WorkerId=~"$workerid", }[$interval])))

panels.title: vLLM: Time To First Token Latency

panels.description: Latency from request start to first token returned (in seconds).

targets.expr:
sum by(model_name, WorkerId) (rate(ray_vllm:e2e_request_latency_seconds_sum{model_name=~"$vllm_model_name", WorkerId=~"$workerid", }[$interval]))
/
sum by(model_name, WorkerId) (rate(ray_vllm:e2e_request_latency_seconds_count{model_name=~"$vllm_model_name", WorkerId=~"$workerid", }[$interval]))
histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by(le, model_name, WorkerId) (rate(ray_vllm:e2e_request_latency_seconds_bucket{model_name=~"$vllm_model_name", WorkerId=~"$workerid", }[$interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.9, sum by(le, model_name, WorkerId) (rate(ray_vllm:e2e_request_latency_seconds_bucket{model_name=~"$vllm_model_name", WorkerId=~"$workerid", }[$interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, model_name, WorkerId) (rate(ray_vllm:e2e_request_latency_seconds_bucket{model_name=~"$vllm_model_name", WorkerId=~"$workerid", }[$interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(le, model_name, WorkerId) (rate(ray_vllm:e2e_request_latency_seconds_bucket{model_name=~"$vllm_model_name", WorkerId=~"$workerid", }[$interval])))
